articles.title: 'I'm a nutritionist - three small changes will make a huge difference to belly fat in women over 50' - GB News
articles.description: Belly fat becomes increasingly problematic with age as hormonal decline redirects fat cells to the body's midsection.These changes are most apparent to women as they approach menopause, which denotes a decline in oestrogen and causes menstruation to cease.
